## PhoneMultiFactorSignInInfoOptions.multiFactorHint property

The [MultiFactorInfo](./auth.multifactorinfo.md) obtained via [MultiFactorResolver.hints](./auth.multifactorresolver.hints.md)<!-- -->.

One of `multiFactorHint` or `multiFactorUid` is required.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiFactorHint?: MultiFactorInfo;
```
